headline: HII’s Ingalls Shipbuilding Honors 2025 Class of Master Shipbuilders
summary: PASCAGOULA, Miss., June 13, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HIl's (NYSE: HII) Ingalls Shipbuilding division honored the 2025 class of master shipbuilders, an elite group of employees who have dedicated 40 years of continuous service to the company, during a special ceremony held at the shipyard June 12. Each of these shipbuilders have committed four decades to building the nation's most advanced naval ships, supporting national security, and mentoring the next generation of shipbuilders. “Reaching 40 y

headline: Huntington Ingalls (HII) Upgraded to Buy: Here's Why
summary: Huntington Ingalls (HII) might move higher on growing optimism about its earnings prospects, which is reflected by its upgrade to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy).
